Goal Representation: ['1. Find a cup.', '2. Fill the cup with water.', '3. Place the cup with water in the freezer.']

behavior find_cup(cup:item):
    body:
        achieve_once visited(cup)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists cup: item : is_cup(cup):
            # If a cup is found in known information, approach it
            bind cup: item where:
                is_cup(cup)
            find_cup(cup)

        else:
            # Check all unvisited items to find a cup
            foreach cup: item:
                if is_cup(cup) and not visited(cup):
                    observe(cup, "Check if the item is a cup")
